info.description: Unvired Mobile Platform Rest API. API Authentication is HTTP BASIC Auth, the user should be passed in as COMPANY\USER. Note: Due to an issue with the way the docs are generated, the response object is not generated correctly.  Until the upstream provider corrects it please check actual responses.
info.title: The UMP4 Rest API

get.description: Returns the list of applications of a company. Any valid user of a company can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: Returns the Application details.  Any valid user of a company can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Activate an Application
post.description: Activate an Application for the Unvired User / Frontend User or Device. Any valid application user can access this API

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend user or device to activate for

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: Gets the application assignment status. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Application has not been assigned yet

post.summary: Assign an application
post.description: Assign an applicaiton so it can be deployed for users. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or app cannot be assigned or does not have a valid plan

get.summary: Download attachment/file from the UMP cache
get.description: Downloads (multipart mime) an attachment/file from the UMP cache. This file can then be accessed by the application for download to a mobile device or other destinations.  Any Application user of the current company can access this API

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: Application name associated with the attachment

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: Attachment Id of the file to download, has to be a GUID

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: System credentials for backend systems, JSON format [{ "port": "LOGICAL_PORT_NAME", "user": "USER_NAME", "password": "PASSWORD"}]

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Upload attachment/file to the UMP cache
post.description: Uploads (multipart mime) an attachment/file to the UMP cache. This file can then be accessed by the application and uploaded to a final server like FTP, DMS etc.  Any Application user of the current company can access this API

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: Attachment Id of the uploaded file, has to be a GUID

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: Authenticate an Application for the Unvired User / Frontend User or Device. Any valid application user can access this API

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend user or device to authenticate

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: Gets the application copy status. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Application has not been copied yet

post.summary: Copy an application
post.description: Copy an applicaiton so it can be deployed for users. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or app cannot be copied or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Deploy an Application
post.description: Deploy an Application for the Unvired User / Frontend User or Device. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend User or Device to deploy for

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Execute an Application Function
post.description: Execute an Application Function to leverage functionality on SAP, Oracle, Sharepoint etc. Any application user can access this API

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: Application that the function belongs to

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: System credentials for backend systems, JSON format [{ "port": "LOGICAL_PORT_NAME", "user": "USER_NAME", "password": "PASSWORD"}]

parameters.name: externalReference
parameters.description: Optional external reference id to associate with the message, mandatory if queued request (async)

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend user or device requesting the execution, if only one frontend user us present this parameter is optional

parameters.name: portName
parameters.description: If the type of user is backendUser, then the UMP logical name of the port (system) these users belong to is specified here

parameters.name: queuedExecute
parameters.description: Execute and return results or queue for execution

204.description: Function did not return any output

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

406.description: Invalid Accept Type, application is not capable of returning the requested type

415.description: Invalid Content Type, application is not capable of accepting the message type

post.summary: Execute an Application Function for other userse
post.description: Execute an Application Function on behalf of other users to leverage functionality on SAP, Oracle, Sharepoint etc. Only application users of type External Server can access this API

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: Application that the function belongs to

parameters.name: externalReference
parameters.description: External reference id to associate with the message

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend user requesting the execution, if only one frontend user is present this parameter is optional.  (user has to be of type External Server)

parameters.name: portName
parameters.description: If the type of user is backendUser, then the UMP logical name of the port (system) these users belong to is specified here

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Type of the user(s) to push the message

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Comma separated list of users based on the userType

204.description: Function did not return any output

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

406.description: Invalid Accept Type, application is not capable of returning the requested type

415.description: Invalid Content Type, application is not capable of accepting the message type

get.description: Gets the count of ready and pending messages. Any application user can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Register for Push notifications
post.description: Register for Push notifications for an Application. Any application user can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

delete.description: Deregister for Push notifications for an Application. Any application user can access this API

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Deploy a library for an application
post.description: Deploy a library for an application. In a Development environment Super Admin,Administrator or Developer of the current company can access this API. In Production environment Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

403.description: Company plan has expired or lib cannot be deployed or does not have a valid plan

delete.description: Deploy a library for an application. In a Development environment Super Admin,Administrator or Developer of the current company can access this API. In Production environment Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

put.summary: Update specific property for an Application
put.description: Update specific property for an Application. Properties are preconfigured by the administrator of UMP. Any application user can access this API

post.summary: Push a message for an Application
post.description: Push a message for an Application. A message is either standard or custom XML or JSON content that is required by the mobile or web application. Any application user can access this API

parameters.name: alert
parameters.description: Alert (Push Notification) message that is displayed to the user when this message is delivered.  If not set notification to download updates will be displayed

parameters.name: externalReference
parameters.description: Optional external reference id to associate with the message

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend user requesting the execution, if only one frontend user is present this parameter is optional

parameters.name: inputMessage
parameters.description: XML or JSON message to push

parameters.name: portName
parameters.description: If the type of user is backendUser, then the UMP logical name of the port (system) these users belong to is specified here

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Type of the user(s) to push the message

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Comma separated list of users based on the userType

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

406.description: Invalid Accept Type, application is not capable of returning the requested type

415.description: Invalid Content Type, application is not capable of accepting the message type

post.summary: Push a notification for an Application
post.description: Push a notification for an Application. Any application user can access this API

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Notification context, can be any small string of data that the client applicaiton can use to associate the data and the notification

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Frontend user requesting the execution, if only one frontend user is present this parameter is optional

parameters.name: portName
parameters.description: If the type of user is backendUser, then the UMP logical name of the port (system) these users belong to is specified here

parameters.name: sound
parameters.description: Sound to play for the notification

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Type of the user(s) to push the message

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Comma separated list of users based on the userType

parameters.description: Company to fetch the users, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: fromTime
parameters.description: Start time for fetching the usage logs, default logs for last 1 hour

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of usage logs returned

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset from which to return the usage logs

parameters.name: toTime
parameters.description: End time for fetching the usage logs

post.summary: Create a session for Unvired User
post.description: Creates a session for the Unvired user.  If building apps where the session needs to be restricted to a single sesion via UMP, this API is useful.  Any valid user of a company can access this API.

401.description: Incorrect password/auth token, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan or session already existing and multiple sessions not enabled

post.summary: Create a session for Unvired User
post.description: Creates a session for the Unvired user. If building apps where the session needs to be restricted to a single sesion via UMP, this API is useful.  Any valid SAP or ADS user of a company can access this API.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: System credentials for SAP or ADS systems , JSON format for SAP [{ "port": "LOGICAL_PORT_NAME", "user": "USER_NAME", "password": "PASSWORD"}] and JSON format for ADS [{ "port": "LOGICAL_PORT_NAME", "user": "DOMAIN_NAME\USER_NAME", "password": "PASSWORD"}]

401.description: REST API disabled, SAP or ADS login failed

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan or session already existing and multiple sessions not enabled

404.description: User not found, FederationId not found or Application not found

delete.summary: Logout from a session for Unvired User
delete.description: Logout form an existing session for the Unvired user.  Every session create should have a callto session logout.  Any valid user of a company can access this API.

401.description: Incorrect password/auth token, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.summary: Ping the platform to determine platform health
get.description: This API is to monitor the health of the UMP API and its system databases
Returns a list of all available Unvired Users.  Any valid user of a company can access this API or SuperAdmin/Admin of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode)

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company to fetch the users, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of users returned

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset from which to return the users

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Create Unvired User
post.description: Creates an Unvired User.  Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company can access this API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company the user belongs to, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password to set, if not provided password is auto generated

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Should the email and username be verified?  If true, strict validation will be done

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Unvired User Name to create (should be between 5 to 20 characters)

parameters.name: verifyEmail
parameters.description: Should the email be verified?  If true, an email with a one time token to verify the email will be sent

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

put.summary: Reset or Change Unvired User Password
put.description: This API can be used to change the password for the Unvired user. If the user knows their old password, the credentials are authenticated against existing password and a password change is allowed. If the password is forgotten, the password can be reset with an earlier issued reset token (forgotPassword API).  Only the current user can access this API

parameters.name: newPassword
parameters.description: The new password for the Unvired User

parameters.name: resetToken
parameters.description: The resetToken obtained via email to reset a forgotten password

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: This API can be used to request a reset token (forgot password). The Company/User is provided via HTTP Basic Authentication, however the passsword is not validated and can be empty.  Only the current user can access this API

401.description: REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: This API can be used to request a verification email. Only the current user can access this API

401.description: REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Verify Email
post.description: This API can be used to verify the email of the user. Only the current user can access this API

401.description: REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

get.description: Rrerieves the details of an Unvired User. If the userName passed is ":me", the current user's details are fetched. The current user (can fetch own details only), Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company (can fetch any user details) can access this API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company the user belongs to, if empty authentication company is used

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

patch.description: Modifies an Unvired User, only values submitted are changed. The current user, Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company can access this API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company the user belongs to, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: First Name of the  user to create

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Last Name of the  user to create

parameters.name: mailId
parameters.description: Email Id of the  user to create

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Enable or Disable a user, only a SA or admin can do this

parameters.name: verifyEmail
parameters.description: Should the email be verified?  If true, an email with a one time token to verify the email will be sent

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

post.summary: Create / Update Backend User
post.description: Create a new backend user or update the backend password for the Unvired user. Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company can access this API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company the users belong to, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: portName
parameters.description: Port (System) for which to add the backend user for

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Unvired User to create the backend user for

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Company or Unvired User or Port not found

delete.description: Delete a Backend User for the Unvired user. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

parameters.name: backendUser
parameters.description: Unvired User whose backend user is to be deleted

parameters.name: portName
parameters.description: Port (System) that the backend user belongs to

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Unvired User or Backend User or Port not found

post.summary: Create a Federation User
post.description: Create a Federation User for the Unvired user / Application. Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company can access this API

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The application for which to add the federation user for

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Unvired User to create the Federation User for

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Unvired User or Application not found

delete.description: Delete a Federation User for the Unvired user / Application. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

parameters.name: appName
parameters.description: Application that the Federation User belongs to

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Unvired User that the Federation User belongs to

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Unvired User or Application not found

post.summary: Create Frontend User or Device
post.description: Create a new Frontend User or Device for the Unvired user. Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company can access this API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company the users belong to, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: frontend
parameters.description: Frontend or Device type to add the frontend user for

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Unique Frontend or device identifier of the  user

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Unvired User to add the frontend user for

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Company or Unvired User not found

delete.description: Delete a Frontend User or Device for the Unvired user. Super Admin or Administrator of the current company can access this API

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Unvired User whose frontend user is to be deleted

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan

404.description: Unvired User or Frontend user not found

post.summary: Provision an application for a new user
post.description: Creates an Unvired User, required FE user and deploy the application.  Super Admin or Administrator of the root company (disallowed in High Security mode) or the current company can access this API

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company the user belongs to, if empty authentication company is used

parameters.name: frontend
parameters.description: Frontend or Device type to add the frontend user for

parameters.name: frontendUser
parameters.description: Unique Frontend or device identifier of the  user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password to set, if not provided password is auto generated

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Should the email and username be verified?  If true, strict validation will be done with configured values

parameters.name: verifyEmail
parameters.description: Should the email be verified?  If true, an email with a one time token to verify the email will be sent

401.description: Incorrect password/authkey, password expired or REST API disabled

403.description: Company plan has expired or does not have a valid plan
